As part of its ongoing Black Friday Week sale event, Amazon is offering notable markdowns on Lexar storage devices, including Express microSD cards, SSDs, flash drives, and more. You can save up to 48% today cashing in on these storage device deals, and the prices start at just $10. In addition to the deals on its Play PRO Express microSD cards, you’ll find a bunch of other Lexar storage devices seeing huge markdowns right now, and we’ve highlighted some of our favorites below the fold for you to check out.

items.title: We love Anker’s 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand with display and it’s down to $150 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of its now live Black Friday Week sale event, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its latest 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand for $149.49 shipped. This is one of the newer models Anker debuted a couple of months back for $230, and it’s now seeing its steepest price drop yet. Today’s 35% discount takes $80 off its usual going rate, landing it $20 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. Both Phantom Gray and White variants have hit the $150 low today, and Anker’s online store is matching the price for them today at $150. It’s one of our favorite 25W Qi2 charging stations at the moment, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: Anker’s expanded SOLIX Black Friday Sale increases power station savings up to 70% with new lows starting from $150
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has launched the next phase of its ongoing Black Friday Sale with increased savings up to 70% across its power stations, bundles, and accessories, giving us the best prices we have seen all year – complete with free gifts with select purchases and at certain price thresholds. Among the expanded lineup, you can score the latest F3000 Portable Power Station starting solo at $1,199 shipped and coming with a FREE protective cover ($99 value), matching in price over at Amazon, though you won’t get the cover there. This new model has been on the market since June carrying a $2,599 full price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,399 up until today. Now, with its Black Friday event in full gear, you’re getting an additional $200 discount to a new all-time low price, giving you a total $1,499 in savings this holiday season. Head below for the full rundown of deals while they’re around.

items.summary:
Segway has switched gears into its official full Black Friday Sale period, expanding the lineup of EV deals we’ve been seeing up until now alongside increasing savings for the best prices of the year. One notable model returning to its best price is the ZT3 Pro All-Terrain Electric Scooter at $849.99 shipped, which matches in price over at Amazon. While it carries a $1,300 MSRP directly from the brand, you can more often find it only fetching $1,000 at full price, with this all-time low price having only appeared during July and October’s Prime Day sales events. You’re getting another shot at $150 off the going rate (and $450 off the MSRP), giving you multi-terrain conquering commuting/joyriding power at the best price we have tracked. Be sure to head below to browse the massive lineup of deals during this Black Friday Sale.

items.title: Lectric’s Black Friday Sale offers up to $893 bundles with e-bikes starting from $999
items.summary:
The month is kicking off big for folks looking to score a commuting solution from one of America’s favorite e-bike brands. Lectric eBikes has launched its early Black Friday Sale that is seeing up to $893 in savings across the e-bike lineup, including another $500 price cut on the premium ONE commuter and up to 25% discounts on accessories. Leading the group with some of the biggest bundles are Lectric’s XPedition Cargo e-bikes, which can be broken down into three configurations: the starting 13Ah single-battery e-bike with $346 in gear at $1,399 shipped, the 26Ah dual-battery e-bike with $744 in gear at $1,799 shipped, or the 35Ah dual-battery long-range e-bike with $893 in gear at $1,999 shipped. These bundles would normally run you $1,745, $2,543, and $2,892, respectively, but now, you’re getting the largest packages we’ve tracked since this second-generation hauler hit the market one year ago.

more…

items.title: EcoFlow launches next Black Friday Sale phase with up to 80% off expanded lineup – starts from $149
items.summary:
EcoFlow has officially switched to its next Black Friday Sale phase of deals with up to 80% discounts, plenty of FREE gifts, bonus savings, and more. Among the new lineup, we spotted EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Portable Power Station bundled with 2x 220W solar panels and a FREE protective bag at $1,699 shipped, which is not only being exclusively offered direct from the brand, but is also dropping things lower than ever. One thing to note here is that, sadly, the extra savings code isn’t valid on this bundle. It would normally run you $5,199 for everything (including the $99 bag), with the bagless bundle at Amazon keeping lower at a starting rate of $3,999 and only dropping to $1,999 right now. This deal comes in $100 under its previous offer during the brand’s Halloween Sale, giving you a total $2,300 off the going rate ($3,500 off the MSRP) for the best new price that we have tracked anywhere. Be sure to head below to check out the newest phase of full Black Friday deals.

Whether you’re looking to pick up some goodies for your Thanksgiving festivities, or just have some time to kill on your day off today, options will be limited when it comes to the major national chains, but it is always a good idea to call ahead just in case. items.title: Point One Navigation, which develops precise location tech, raised a $35M Series C led by Khosla Ventures, a source says at a post-money valuation of $230M (Kirsten Korosec/TechCrunch)
items.summary:
